text: Table tennis at the 2016 Summer Paralympics in Rio happened in September 2016. 276 people competed in 29 events. This included 174 men and 102 women. Table tennis has been at the Paralympics since the first Games in 1960. There were 2 kinds of table tennis played. These were singles and doubles. China got the most medals. == Medal table == == References == Category:2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis
title: Table tennis at the 2016 Summer Paralympics
